```{r}
if (!require("here")) install.packages("here")
library("here")
suppressMessages(source(here("R", "00_setup.R")))

```

```{r}
dataset_path <- here("data", "R100289_METAB02_MEC078_20220901.csv")

mSet <- InitDataObjects("conc", "stat", FALSE)
mSet <- Read.TextData(mSet, dataset_path, "rowu", "disc")
mSet <- SanityCheckData(mSet)
mSet <- ReplaceMin(mSet)
mSet <- IsSmallSmplSize(mSet)
mSet <- PreparePrenormData(mSet)
mSet <- Normalization(mSet, "NULL", "NULL", "NULL", "C01", ratio=TRUE, ratioNum=20)
```

```{r}
mSet <- CalculateFeatureRanking(mSet)
```


```{r}
mSet<-SetAnalysisMode(mSet, "univ")
mSet<-PrepareROCData(mSet)
```

```{r}
mSet<-Perform.UnivROC(mSet, feat.nm = "Aspartic Acid", "png", dpi=300, isAUC=F, isOpt=T, optMethod="closest.topleft", isPartial = F, measure="sp", cutoff=0.2)
```
